sentence.Network_en: Most doctors want their patients to be submissive.
sentence.Network_cn: 大部分医生希望病人能听从医嘱。

sentence.Network_en: He expected his daughters to be meek and submissive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他期望女儿都温顺听话。

sentence.Network_en: Their early training programmes them to be obedient and submissive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们早期受过的教育把他们训练得俯首帖耳、唯命是从.

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... submission n 屈服 submissive a 服从的 transmission n 转送；传达.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... submerge 沉没，淹没 submissive 恭顺的 subordinate 附属的.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 顺从的愿意屈服的或服从的
PerfectNetExp.abs: 拿破仑致约瑟芬 ... adore v. 爱慕付以深切的，通常是痴迷的爱 submissive v. 顺从的愿意屈服的或服从的 adorable adj. 值得崇拜的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from submission, on the pattern of pairs such as remission, remissive

entry.def: If you are submissive, you obey someone without arguing.

example.ex: Most doctors want their patients to be submissive.
example.tran: 大部分医生希望病人能听从医嘱。

means.word_mean: 1. inclined or willing to submit to orders or wishes of others or showing such inclination;
2. willing to submit without resistance to authority; deferent
3. abjectly submissive; characteristic of a slave or servant;

sentences.sentence: "slavish devotion to her job ruled her life"
"a slavish yes-man to the party bosses"- S.H.Adams

auth_sentence.content: Will the submissive become leader or dominant become leader.

auth_sentence.content: Janet became...submissive and suffered Stephanie to put her to bed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Janet became...submissive and suffered Stephanie to put her to bed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Janet became...submissive and suffered Stephanie to put her to bed.

auth_sentence.content: The one whose periods change is she submissive or dominant.
auth_sentence.res_content: The one whose periods change is she submissive or dominant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The one whose periods change is she submissive or dominant.

stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+miss送,放出+ive……的→送出去
miss[v.错过;想念]+ing表形容词→adj.不见的, 缺少的
re不+miss送,放出,派,错过→不送出去→怠慢的
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ive……的→始终放出→纵容的
sub在下面+miss放+ive表形容词→放下面→恭顺的
mission[n.使命,任务;使团,代表团]+ary人→n.传教士

stems_affixes.value_cn: 委员会;委任,委托[书],代办;佣金,手续费

e出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→送出去
miss派+ion表名词→派遣
re再+miss送,放出+ion表名词→再次放过[别人]→宽恕
o出+miss送,放出+ion表名词→放出去→省略
per始终+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→始终放出→允许
trans横+miss送,放出+ion表名词→横着送出去→播送
e出+miss送,放出+ary人→送出去的人
sub下面+miss送,放出,派,错过+ion表名词→放下面→屈服
dis分开+miss送→分开送出→解散
miss放出,错过→错过;想念

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"接近,靠近"; 2. 在后面;再; 3. 表示"在下面,次一等,副手"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub接近,靠近+acid酸→adj.略酸的
sub接近,靠近+adult成年人→adj.接近成年的
sub接近,靠近+arctic北极的→adj.近北极的
sub接近,靠近+arid干燥的→adj.有点干燥的
sub接近,靠近+central中心的→adj.接近中心的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+limin门槛+al……的→在门槛下→在意识之下→潜意识的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+miss放+ive……的→放下面→恭顺的
sub在下面,次一等,副手+terr地+anean→地下的
sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养
sub再+let出租→v.转租 n.转租的房屋
sub在下面,次一等,副手+area区域→n.分区
sub在下面,次一等,副手+branch枝, 分枝, 分部→n.小分支;支[分]店;分公司

stems_affixes.value_cn: 副助理监督, 副助理主教

sub在下面,次一等,副手+editor编辑→n.助理编辑
sub在下面,次一等,副手+head标题→n.小标题, 副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+office办公室→n.分办事处
sub在下面,次一等,副手+officer官员→n.下级军官
sub在下面,次一等,副手+title标题→n.副标题
sub在下面,次一等,副手+tropic热带+s→亚热带

sub接近+culture栽培,培育;文化→n.次培养基;亚文化 v.次培养

sub在下面,次一等,副手+due债务,义务→减轻
sub在下面,次一等,副手+jug牛轭+ate表动词→套上牛轭→镇压
sub在下面,次一等,副手+merg沉没+e→淹没下去
sub在下面,次一等,副手+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂
sub在下面,次一等,副手+scrib写+e→在下面写上名字→订购
sub在下面,次一等,副手+side坐→坐下去→平息
sub在下面,次一等,副手+vert转→转下去→推翻

means.word_mean: 顺从的, 唯命是从的

sentences.en: He expects his wife to be meek and submissive.
sentences.cn: 他期望妻子温顺而且听他摆布。

sentences.cn: 他们早期受过的教育把他们训练得俯首帖耳、唯命是从。
